pageHeader.title: Our Mission
pageHeader.description: A connected and compassionate Murray where all residents are empowered to thrive, grow, and build a stronger, safer community together.

whoWeAre.title: Murray Partners 4 Prevention
paragraphs: Murray Partners 4 Prevention (P4P) is a community coalition dedicated to building a stronger, safer Murray. We bring together residents, organizations, and local leaders to address community challenges through prevention, education, and support.
Our coalition works collaboratively with schools, healthcare providers, city government, businesses, and community organizations to create programs and initiatives that empower residents of all ages.
whoWeAre.vision: A connected and compassionate Murray where all residents are empowered to thrive, grow, and build a stronger, safer community together.

values.title: Compassion
values.description: We lead with empathy and understanding, recognizing the unique challenges each Murray resident faces.

values.title: Connection
values.description: Building bridges between families, organizations, and community resources to create lasting support networks.

values.title: Prevention
values.description: Proactively addressing community challenges before they become crises through education and early intervention.

values.title: Empowerment
values.description: Giving residents the tools, knowledge, and confidence to thrive and contribute to our community.

focusAreas.title: Youth Development
focusAreas.description: Empowering young people with leadership skills, mentorship opportunities, and positive community engagement.

focusAreas.title: Family Support
focusAreas.description: Connecting families with resources for health, education, and well-being to strengthen the foundation of our community.

focusAreas.title: Substance Prevention
focusAreas.description: Educating residents about substance abuse prevention and providing support for those seeking help.

focusAreas.title: Community Safety
focusAreas.description: Working with local organizations to create a safer environment for all Murray residents.

cta.title: Join Our Mission
cta.description: Whether you're a resident, organization, or business, there are many ways to get involved with Murray Partners 4 Prevention.
